description.value:
Age. Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

Creature Type. You are a Humanoid. You are also considered an elf for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be an elf.

Size. Your size is Medium. Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds.

Speed. Your base Speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision to a range of 60 feet.

Extra Language. You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

Fey Ancestry. You have Advantage on saving throws against being &Reference[Charmed apply=false], and magic cannot put you to sleep.

Incisive Sense. You have Advantage on Investigation and Insight checks.

Keen Senses. You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Pallid Magic. You know the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLight00000]{Light} cantrip. When you reach character level 3, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleep00000]{Sleep} spell with this trait. When you reach character level 5, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplInvisibili]{Invisibility} spell (targeting yourself only) with it. Once you cast Sleep or Invisibility with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this species). None of these spells require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

Trance. You do not need to sleep, and magic cannot put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.

Whenever you finish this trance, you can gain proficiency in one skill of your choice and with one weapon or tool of your choice, selected from the Player's Handbook. You mystically acquire these proficiencies by drawing them from shared elven memory, and you retain them until you finish your next Long Rest.

advancement.title: Extra Language
advancement.hint: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

advancement.title: Keen Senses
advancement.hint: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

advancement.title: Pallid Magic: Light
advancement.hint:
You know the light cantrip.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell when you cast it with this trait (choose below). This spell does not require spell components when you cast it with this trait.

advancement.title: Pallid Magic: Sleep
advancement.hint:
When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the sleep spell with this trait.  Once you cast sleep with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell when you cast it with this trait (choose below). This spell does not require spell components when you cast it with this trait.

advancement.title: Pallid Magic: Invisibility
advancement.hint:
Starting at 5th level, you can cast the invisibility spell (targeting yourself only) with it. Once you cast invisibility with this trait, you cannot cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell when you cast it with this trait (choose below). This spell does not require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

advancement.title: INT Bonus
advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).

advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
